item.title: Out of Sequence, 18th September
item.description:
Traffic lights from Cheltenham side towards Gloucester are out of sinc giving priority from side roads for 3 mins then main road traffic 30 seconds causing serious blockages on Elmbridge roundabout with fast flowing traffic suddenly faced with traffic travelling from left or right direction suddenly stopping in the lane they are using to flow through the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nine Elms Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 18th September
item.description:
Customer reports that a team have been relaying tarmac at the location this morning. They advise they have "slapped down" the material and the surface is worse than it was previously (it's uneven): it is a poor job and there's no improvement. They have limited mobility and need a level surface. Please can Highways investigate.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 18th September
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. As part of routine monthly driven inspection, found Permit Holders only parking sign is loose in foundations in footway. The surrounding slabs are not moving so is not at immediate risk of falling into the carriageway. Please arrange permanent repair of loose sign in footway.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Bollard shell is damaged/vandalised problem, 18th September
item.description:
Please pass to Street Lighting team for further investigation. Missing illuminated keep left bollard on island. This has previously been made safe with temporary keep left sign. No obvious damage to the base and no exposed wires observed. Please arrange replacement bollard to be installed at this location.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction to narrow section of shared use path, 18th September
item.description:
This section of shared use path is already too narrow but in the centre of the footpath on the point of a blind corner by a road crossing the path was badly laid. This has resulted in a large puddle blocking half the path. As cyclists and pedestrians avoid this is funnels them into head on collisions on a blind corner and this will only get worse as winter continues. Plus the large puddle poses a big ice risk for frosty mornings. Can the pavement be finished by someone competent this time?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 315, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Large puddle in road with pedestrians getting soaked by passing car., 17th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Birdlip, Cotswold
